title: Is Vibrant Academy good for the NEET and AIIMS? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: I would like to update you that Vibrant Academy is not providing education to NEET and AIMS aspirants . Its a strong platform for IIT JEE {Mains & Advanced} preparation . They has a superior strength in all areas of academics for JEE {Main & Advanced} . So if you dream of IIT Vibrant Academy are the sturdiest possible foundation for success .

As vibrant academy started medical branch from this year. So they have no experience in this field. According to me you should join vibrant only if u are a jee aspirant otherwise join allen cuz produced great results in past. At last i just wanna say u that no coaching is good until you are fully dedicated and hardworking. Pls upvote!!
